#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <conio.h>

using namespace std;

/**
 * Auto-generated code below aims at helping you parse
 * the standard input according to the problem statement.
 **/
int main()
{
    int t = 0; // величина температуры от -273 дo 5526
    int result = 5527;
    int n = 0; //количество температур для анализа
    cin >> n; cin.ignore();

       if(0 <= n && n < 10000)
        {
           if(n == 0)
           {
               result = 0;
           }
           else
           {
             for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
             {
                cin >> t; cin.ignore();
                if(-273 <= t && t <= 5526)
                {
                    if(t < 0 && result > 0)
                    {
                        if(result > (t * -1))
                        {
                            result = t;
                        }
                        else if(result == (t * -1))
                        {
                            result = t * -1;
                        }
                    }
                    else if(t < 0 && result < 0)
                    {
                        if(result < t)
                        {
                             result = t;
                        }
                    }
                    else if(t > 0 && result < 0)
                    {
                        if((result * -1) > t)
                        {
                            result = t;
                        }
                        else if(result == (t * -1))
                        {
                            result = t;
                        }
                    }
                    else if(t > 0 && result > 0)
                    {
                        if(result > t)
                        {
                            result = t;
                        }
                    }
                }
                cout << result << endl;
             }
        }





    cout << to_string(result) << endl;






}
